price: E talvez, Muhammad, te mates de pesar, após a partida deles se não crêem nesta Mensagem.
arabic: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمۡ إِن لَّمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: falaʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka ʿalā āthārihim in lam yu'minū bihādhā al-ḥadīthi asafan
